author: Ed Baines
method: Boil the potatoes until just cooked. Make up a simple viniagrette using 3 parts oil to 1 part vinegar. Add the onions, garlic, herbs and seasoning. Drain the potatoes and whilst they are still hot, tip them into the dressing. Stir well and serve.
ingredients: 2-3 large potatoes, cut into cubes olive oil ,  wine vinegar ,  medium sized onion, chopped ,  1-2 cloves garlic, crushed ,  handful fresh herbs, chopped ,  salt and pepper
